column2: "Na ɔwo
column3: onyimpa ba
column4: hyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ Israel mbepɔw no

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ tamfo no aka hom ho asɛm dɛ
column3: Yɛɛ! Na
column4: Tsetse mbepɔw no abɛyɛ hɛndze no:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi hyɛ nkɔm
column3: na se dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osian ara mpo dɛ wɔayɛ hom amamfo
column6: ma hom adan enyadze ama amanaman nkaa no
column8: na hom ayɛ nkorɔfo nsopa ntsi:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi
column3: Israel mbepɔw
column4: hom ntsie EWURADZE Nyankopɔn n'asɛm; Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛ mbepɔw na akoko
column6: ekurofo na nkurow a woetutu do a ayeyɛ afodze na asesardze ama amanaman nkaa a wɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no nye yi:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Ampa me nyinkuntwe gya no mu na makasa etsia amanaman nkaa no
column3: na Edom nyina wɔdze hɔn akoma nyina n'enyigye na kra mu enyimtsiabu mu afa m'asaase ayɛ hɔn enyadze

column2: "dɛm ntsi hyɛ Israel asaase ho nkɔm
column3: na se mbepɔw na akoko
column5: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hwɛ
column6: maka no wɔ me nyinkuntwe na m'ebufuhyew mu
column7: osiandɛ hom asoa abosonsɔrfo enyito ntsi:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Mama me nsa do
column3: dɛ
column5: abosonsɔrfo a abɔ hom ho aprɔw no

column2: "Na hom
column3: Israel mbepɔw dze
column5: na hom asow hom aba ama me man Israel; na wɔabɛn wɔreba."

column2: "Na
column3: hwɛ
column6: na wɔbɔdɔw hom na woedua hom do adze:"

column2: "na mebɛma nyimpa adɔɔ so wɔ hom do
column3: Israel fi nyina nyina: na nkurow no wɔbɛtsenatsena mu

column2: "na mebɛma nyimpa na mbowa adɔɔ so wɔ hom do; na wɔbɔdɔr na wɔawowo: na mebɛma wɔatsenatsena hom do dɛ hom nkan no ber no
column3: na mayɛ hom yie asen hom ahyɛse no: na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Nyew
column3: mebɛma nyimpa anantsenantsew hom do
column4: me man Israel no a; na wɔbɛfa wo ayɛ hɔndze
column7: erennda ho nngye hɔn nsamu mba bio."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Osiandɛ wɔse wo dɛ
column3: Ɔwo asaase yi eyɛ nyimpa ɔmememfo
column4: na ama wo man edzi awo mba ewu:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi eremmemen nyimpa bio
column3: eso eremma wo man nndzi awo mba ewu bio

column2: "eso meremma enntse abosonsɔrfo enyito no bio
column3: eso eronnsoa aman ahorohoraa bio
column4: eso eremma wo man mmfintsiw bio

column2: "EWURADZE n'asɛm baa mo hɔ bio
column3: dɛ
column6: ber a Israel fi tsenatsenaa hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do no
column7: wɔdze hɔn abrabɔ na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ guu ho fi: hɔn abrabɔ yɛɛ m'enyi do dɛ ɔbrafo no ho fi."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na muhuee m'ebufuhyew guu hɔn do wɔ bɔgya a wɔkae guu asaase no do ntsi
column3: na hɔn abosom a wɔdze guu ho fi no ntsi:"

column2: "na mobɔɔ hɔn petsee amanaman mu
column3: na mepansaam hɔn guguu nkurow do: mbrɛ hɔn abrabɔ na hɔn ndzeyɛɛ tse no

column2: "Na wodur amanaman a wɔkɔr hɔ no do no
column3: wohuraa me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho; wɔ dɛ adasa kaa no wɔ hɔn ho dɛ

column2: "Na minyaa tsema wɔ me dzin krɔnkrɔn a Israel fifo huraa ho wɔ amanaman a wɔkɔr hɔn mu no ntsi."
"Dɛm ntsi se Israel fifo dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Israel fifo
column4: nnyɛ hom ntsi bi na meyɛ iyi
column5: na mbom me dzin krɔnkrɔn a hom huraa ho wɔ amanaman a hom kɔr hɔn mu no ntsi a."

column2: "Na mebɛyɛ me dzin kɛse a woegu ho fi
column3: wɔ amanaman a hom egu ho fi wɔ hɔn mu no krɔnkrɔn; na amanaman bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column5: ber a wɔbɛda mo krɔnkrɔnyɛ edzi wɔ hom mu wɔ hom enyiwa mu no."

column2: "Na mibeyi hom efi amanaman mu
column3: na maboaboa hom ano efi nkurow nkurow nyina do
column4: na medze hom aba homankasa hom asaase do."

column2: "Na medze esu krɔngyenn mebɛpetse hom do
column3: na hom ho atsew: hom ho fi nyina
column4: na hom abosom nyina na mebɛtsew hom ho efi."

column2: "Mebɛma hom akoma fofor so
column3: na medze sunsum fofor ahyɛ hom mu: na mibeyi ɔbo akoma efi hom honam mu

column2: "Na medze mo sunsum bɛhyɛ hom mu
column3: na mama hom anantsew m'ahyɛdze mu

column2: "Na hom bɛtsena asaase a medze maa hom egyanom no do; na hom bɛyɛ me man
column3: na emi so mayɛ hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na mebɛgye hom efi hom efifidze nyina mu: na mebɛfrɛ eburow aba
column3: na mama ɔadɔɔ so
column4: na meremmfa kɔm bi nnto hom do."

column2: "Na mebɛma dua no nsowee
column3: na hamu ndɔbaa adɔɔ so
column4: amma hom ennya kɔm ho ahorohoraa wɔ amanaman mu bio."

column2: "Nna hom bɛkaa hom abrabɔ bɔn
column3: na hom ndzeyɛɛ a ɔnnyɛ no; na homankasa hom ho bɛyɛ hom nkɔw wɔ hom enyiwa do wɔ hom emumuyɛ na hom atantandze no ntsi."

column2: "Nnyɛ hom ntsi bi na meyɛ iyi
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse
column5: hom enyi nto na hom enyim ngu ase wɔ hom abrabɔ ntsi."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Da a mebɛtsew hom ho efi hom emumuyɛdze nyina mu no
column3: mebɛma wɔatsenatsena nkurow no do

column2: "Na asaase a ɔda hɔ pan no
column3: wɔbɔdɔw
column4: ber a nkyɛ ɔdaa hɔ pan wɔ hɔn a wotwaa mu nyina enyiwa mu no."

column2: "Na wɔbɛse dɛ
column3: Asaase a ɔdaa hɔ pan yi na ɔayɛ dɛ Eden ture yi; na nkurow a ɔbobɔe
column4: ɔyeyɛɛ amamfo na odwurudwuruwii no na wɔagyegye ho ban na wɔtsetse do yi."

column2: "Nna amanaman a aka a wɔabɔ hom ho aprɔw no bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE na mesi dza odwuruwii no
column3: na matsɛw dza ɔyɛɛ afo no: emi EWURADZE na maka

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Iyi so ntsi na Israel fifo bɛba mo hɔ ebisa
column3: ma mayɛ mama hɔn; mebɛma wɔadɔr nyimpa dɛ nguankuw."

column2: "Dɛ nguankuw a wɔdze bɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column3: dɛ Jerusalɛm nguankuw wɔ n'afahyɛ ber mu; dɛmara so na ekurofo no nyimpa ekuwekuw bɛhyehyɛ no amaama: na wobohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."
